derivation: a primitive root; also interchangeable  with H2821 (חָשַׁךְ)
outline:
1. to withhold, restrain, hold back, keep in check, refrain
    1. (Qal)
      1. to withhold, keep back, keep for oneself, keep from, hold in check, refrain, spare, reserve
      2. to restrain, check
    2. (Niphal) to assuage, be spared
kjv_def: assuage, [idiom] darken, forbear, hinder, hold back, keep (back), punish, refrain, reserve, spare, withhold.
strongs_def: to restrain or (reflex.) refrain; by implication, to refuse, spare, preserve; to observe
